summary: Adds a Hand crafted abode into the skyrim world complete with everything you could ever need packed into one lovely area.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i821.photobucket.com/albums/zz132/Bradley_Kefford/introduction.png[/IMG]
------Map location----
[IMG]http://i821.photobucket.com/albums/zz132/Bradley_Kefford/Untitled-2.png[/IMG]

------Videos------

[youtube]E1hOCWxYeJQ[/youtube]   [youtube]I1zZGkugHvo[/youtube] 

[youtube]2-lz17NzVuw[/youtube]           [youtube]zX33m0fgxmo[/youtube] 

[youtube]Psi0q9f3hSI[/youtube] 
[IMG]http://i821.photobucket.com/albums/zz132/Bradley_Kefford/features-3.png[/IMG]
-Hand crafted mountains 
-Hand crafted area from scratch,everything you see has been hand placed 
-Everything you could need
=Smelter
=Smithing area
=Alchemy
=Enchanting
=Leather working
=Chopping 
-All linked up into a forest with:
=Resting areas to enjoy the view
=A bed area
=Loads of storage in all kinds of locations arount the area

And much much more!

[IMG]http://i821.photobucket.com/albums/zz132/Bradley_Kefford/updates-1.png[/IMG]

V1.0 Release

V1.2
+Added More flora to some areas
+added more detail across the board
+Added cooking area
=Welcomed in some little insect friends
=Water particles improved
author: Countercruel
